decisionsLog.decision: All Settings fields optional with defaults, no eager validation at module level
decisionsLog.reason: Tests run without .env file; lru_cache singleton validates on first get_settings() call

decisionsLog.decision: Scope config.py to deps.py only, service files keep os.getenv fallback
decisionsLog.reason: Service files have direct instantiation paths for testing; centralizing everything in one spec increases risk
